title: 06/24/2021 - HOUR 1 - Hawks, Durant, Mayfield
itunes:title: 06/24/2021 - HOUR 1 - Hawks, Durant, Mayfield
description:
The Hawks are a great story but the Eastern Conference is weak

Kevin Durant is more gifted than Michael Jordan

The Browns should wait before giving Baker Mayfield a new contract


Guest: Nick Wright
